In this release:
- Usage tracking with TelemetryDeck was added.
- GS plugins were renamed in preparation to publish them.
- Backstage packages were updated to v1.31.3.
See [./docs/releases/v0.40.0-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.40.0-changelog.md) for more information.
